abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton’s first post on Instagram features a rack full of red, white and blue jackets of the pants suits she is known for — a play on her memoir, “Hard Choices.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Hard Choice: Her First Instagram Post

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton’s first post on Instagram features a rack full of red, white and blue jackets of the pants suits she is known for — a play on her memoir, “Hard Choices.”
